J

JavaHtmlGui - class JavaHtmlGui.
Display class to show the JavaHtml application as a Java 2 Application.
JavaHtmlGui() - Constructor for class JavaHtmlGui
Default constructor to setup the window
JavaHtmlLine - class JavaHtmlLine.
The JavaHtmlLine class translates Java line to HTML JavaHtml using the rules: Any each tab and space at the start of the line becomes a &nbsp; Each < in the line becomes a &lt; Each > in the line becomes a &gt; Each & in the line becomes a &amp; The line has <BR> appended to it
JavaHtmlLine() - Constructor for class JavaHtmlLine
The null constructor which initializes everything to the default state.
JavaHtmlModel - class JavaHtmlModel.
Class which handles the file I/O and returns the summary of the job.
JavaHtmlModel() - Constructor for class JavaHtmlModel
Null constructor which initializes the instance variables.

M

main(String[]) - Static method in class JavaHtmlGui
Main method to get stuff started
main(String[]) - Static method in class JavaHtmlLine
Main to test the class.
main(String[]) - Static method in class JavaHtmlModel
Main to test the class.

S

setInputFilename(String) - Method in class JavaHtmlModel
Accepts a non-null file name to be used as the input file name.
setLine(String) - Method in class JavaHtmlLine
Set the line to be translated to html.

T

translate() - Method in class JavaHtmlModel
Method which performs the translation of the input file to the output file.
